Offset and Multiplier:Multiplier Property

Short Name: Multiplier

Requires: Base Development System

Class: ColorGraphScale Properties

To Use: Create a property.

Multiplier, or interval, for scaling data using (deltaX)*X + Xo.

This property is an element of the Offset and Multiplier property.

This property is similar to the Offset option on the Scales page of the Intensity Graph Properties dialog box.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead/Write
Available in Run-Time EngineYes
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Settable when the VI is runningYes
Loads the front panel into memoryNo
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryNo
Remote access allowedYes
